title: Barley risotto with sweet potato, port glazed onion and toasted walnuts
ingredients: ['3 sweet potatoes, peeled and diced into 1cm pieces', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt', '200g pearl barley', '500ml vegetable stock', '70g chopped walnuts', '1/2 tablespoon olive oil', '2 large red onions, sliced into 6mm rounds', '1 pinch salt', '75ml port', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
